text:
I might be missing the point (so, i'm sorry if so) but does the SMS app actually work in deal workflows...?

You're screenshots show contact-based working OK, but deal-based not.

I have a marketplace SMS app connected but it only works on contact-based workflows, not deals.

If that's not even close to the right answer, then hopefully someone else can come along and help!

<@U06H94JKK1P>
Oh, I just solved this problem today.
The answer is to raise the workflow api version.
I had previously created the api with v1 version and when I created it with v4 instead of modifying it, it worked on a dealbased basis!
Thanks for the answer : )
Hello ! I'd like to copy info coming from ad interaction to contact fields : is there a way to do so ? Maybe through custom code ? Many thanks and have a great day all :sun_with_face:
